name: The Earth is Flat or something like that...
name_original: The Earth is Flat or something like that...
description:
A four months school project on the theme of Isolation.

Play as Georges, a scientist who wants to prove his theory.
In his mind the Earth is round althought everyone knows it's flat !
To prove them wrong, you'll have to build a spaceship to take a picture of the Earth.
